album.title: Now That's What I Call Music, Vol. 77

wiki.summary: Justin Bieber reunites with Chance the Rapper and kicks off a “new era” on “Holy”, a song that focuses on their love for their respective significant others. It draws a parallel between relationships and the prescriptions, stemming from both religion and outsiders. Chance focuses on both maintaining faith and enjoying life. The song serves as the lead single from Justin’s sixth studio album "Justice". The official music video premiered alongside the song on September 18, 2020. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: Justin Bieber reunites with Chance the Rapper and kicks off a “new era” on “Holy”, a song that focuses on their love for their respective significant others. It draws a parallel between relationships and the prescriptions, stemming from both religion and outsiders. Chance focuses on both maintaining faith and enjoying life. The song serves as the lead single from Justin’s sixth studio album "Justice". The official music video premiered alongside the song on September 18, 2020. It also stars actress Ryan Destiny to play Justin’s love interest, while Chance is also present, but only for his verse. Read more on Last.fm.
